## PBInsideFunctionScope.$choice() method

Creates a select statement: condition ? first : second

**Signature:**

```typescript
$choice(condition: ExpValueNonArrayType, first: ExpValueNonArrayType, second: ExpValueNonArrayType): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  condition | [ExpValueNonArrayType](doc/markdown/./device.expvaluenonarraytype.md) | Condition expression |
|  first | [ExpValueNonArrayType](doc/markdown/./device.expvaluenonarraytype.md) | The first value |
|  second | [ExpValueNonArrayType](doc/markdown/./device.expvaluenonarraytype.md) | The second value |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The first value if condition evaluates to true, otherwise returns the second value
